title: Ep. 644 The Swamp is Slowly Draining
description:
A terrific piece about the damaging leaks against the Trump team.

Another incredible piece about the law firm involved with the Obama campaign arm, Hillary Clinton, the DNC, and the Russian “hacking” narrative.

Who was paying this law firm to uncover Russian “hacking?” 

Will the memo expose the Democrats as supporters of the police state?

Is Michelle Obama running for President?

A State of the Union preview.

 

Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
